titleStmt.title: An ansvver to the author of Humble thanks for His Majesties gracious declaration for liberty of conscience.
titleStmt.author: Y. Z.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Edwin at the three Roses in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "'Twixt heaven and thee, how sprung these fatal jars ..."
A reply to the work by Robert Wild, with reference to Charles II's declaration of 15 March 1672.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
